The only reason your first post was illegal, was because it broke so 
many rules that it was almost impossible to reply to, too much had 
to be changed to . If your post abides by the rules then it can't and 
won't be disregarded. You shouldn't need to worry about have any 
illegal posts, most initial posts tend to be incorrect for various 
reasons. You'll get the hang of it quickly. =) Take Soulstice's start 
post for example.

WarBarge, don't encourage him! =P
